text: Pope Alexander VI Quamvis ad amplianda is a papal bull issued by Pope Alexander VI on 1 June 1500 calling for a crusade against the Ottoman Empire in response to Ottoman invasions of Venetian territories in Greece. After requests for funds and military support from the German Reichstag were rejected, a universal tithe was instituted within the bull. ==References== ==Sources== * * * Category:16th-century papal bulls Category:Documents of Pope Alexander VI
title: Quamvis ad amplianda
